title: r2-bike (r2-bike.com) scraper
description: Scrapes products titles, prices, images and availability. Does NOT scrape product details. Uses Crawlee (Apify v3).

APIFY_DONT_STORE_IN_DATASET.sectionDescription: Advanced options, use only if you know what you're doing.
APIFY_DONT_STORE_IN_DATASET.title: Don't store in dataset
APIFY_DONT_STORE_IN_DATASET.description: If set to true, the actor will not store the results in the default dataset. Useful when using alternative storage, like own database

PG_CONNECTION_STRING_NORMALIZED.title: Postgres connection string for normalized data
PG_CONNECTION_STRING_NORMALIZED.description: If set, actor will store normalized data in Postgres database in PG_DATA_TABLE and PG_DATA_PRICE_TABLE tables

PG_DATA_TABLE.title: Postgres table name for product data
PG_DATA_TABLE.description: Table name for storing product name, url, image, ...

PG_DATA_PRICE_TABLE.title: Postgres table name for price data
PG_DATA_PRICE_TABLE.description: Table name for storing price, original price, stock status, ...
